channel.title: Item Trade
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Item Trade" - Because we really need one of these. (Item Mail)

item.title: Re: Item Trade
item.content:encoded:
Hello, here again, I offer a Stealth Suit and a Necklace of the First HoCage in exchange of a Codec.
And a Necklace of the First HoCage along a Billy Bucket for a Love Love Paradise.
I am willing to negotiate for a good Monster Drop.


Be the Ultimate Ninja! Play Billy Vs. SNAKEMAN today

item.title: Re: Item Trade
item.content:encoded:
Er.. I am only willing to trade one of each, those are from before I looped, and I will need them when I have access to Wasteland, so I can't negotiate 'em. Sorry, the only important thing that I feel that I would trade would be billy buckets, and not all of them, that's why I offered two, 'cause I'll need the others to level up emosuke, with one as a spare.


Be the Ultimate Ninja! Play Billy Vs. SNAKEMAN today

item.title: Re: Item Trade
item.content:encoded:
what do you want for ash-covered tiles? i haven't got any spare perms but i can give something else. maybe a CRW? that'd be for like 5-10 of them though.
its still negotiable, so if you want something else, let me know.

item.title: Re: Item Trade
item.content:encoded:
I forgot, I have an additional Billy Bucket, as well as Crumbling Minerals, Ash-Covered Tile, Broken Spyglass and a Threadbare Robes, in case you wish to negotiate rare monster drops (Regalia comes to mind).


Be the Ultimate Ninja! Play Billy Vs. SNAKEMAN today

item.title: Item Trade
item.content:encoded: Alright first thing, I offer a Necklace of the First HoCage, and a Billy Bucket in exchange of a Codec or a Monster Drop (except Perfect Hair or similars), so, any takers?
